segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Sāriputta was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā.
segments.en: Now at that time Venerable Sāriputta was educating, encouraging, firing up, and inspiring the mendicants in the assembly hall with a Dhamma talk. His words were polished, clear, articulate, and expressed the meaning.

segments.pli: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
segments.en: And those mendicants were paying heed, paying attention, engaging wholeheartedly, and lending an ear.

segments.pli: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā.
segments.en: “This Venerable Sāriputta is educating the mendicants. …

segments.pli: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
segments.en: And those mendicants are paying heed, paying attention, engaging wholeheartedly, and lending an ear.

segments.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
segments.en: Why don’t I extoll him in his presence with fitting verses?”

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Venerable Vaṅgīsa got up from his seat, arranged his robe over one shoulder, raised his joined palms toward Sāriputta, and said,

segments.pli: “paṭibhāti maṃ, āvuso sāriputta, paṭibhāti maṃ, āvuso sāriputtā”ti.
segments.en: “I feel inspired to speak, Reverend Sāriputta! I feel inspired to speak, Reverend Sāriputta!”
“Then speak as you feel inspired,” said Sāriputta.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
segments.en: Then Vaṅgīsa extolled Sāriputta in his presence with fitting verses:
expert in the variety of paths;
His call, like a myna bird,
the mendicants listen to his sweet voice,

sections.title: At one time Venerable Sāriputta was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: Seeing Sāriputta speak on the Dhamma, and the rapt attention of the Saṅgha, Vaṅgīsa comes out with verses in his praise.
